card.title: Site Preparation & Land Grading Services

card.alt: A bulldozer grading land for site preparation and foundation work.

hero.heading: Site Preparation & Land Grading Services
hero.subheading: Precision Grading & Land Clearing for a Strong Construction Foundation
hero.alt: A bulldozer leveling ground for a future construction project.

intro.heading: Start Your Project with Proper Site Preparation
intro.content: Bellhouse Excavating handles full site preparation, including stripping topsoil, rough grading, land shaping, and excavation for foundations, roads, and drainage. Proper site prep sets your project up for long-term success.

includes.heading: Site Prep & Grading Includes
includes.subheading: Everything required to turn raw land into a build-ready site.

items.title: Topsoil Stripping
items.description: Removal of organics and topsoil to expose stable subgrade.

items.title: Rough & Final Grading
items.description: We shape the land for proper drainage and building layout.

items.title: Building Pad Prep
items.description: Creation of level, compacted pads for shops, barns, and homes.

items.title: Ditching & Drainage
items.description: Ditches and swales to manage water and protect structures.

equipment.heading: Equipment Used for Site Prep
equipment.subheading: Excavation and grading equipment suited for small to mid-size sites.

items.title: Excavator
items.description: Used for cutting grades, trenching, and bulk excavation.

items.title: Tri-Axle Dump Trucks
items.description: Hauling away unsuitable material and bringing in base or fill.

items.title: Diesel Plate Tamper
items.description: Compacting building pads, driveways, and trenches.

items.title: Rotary Laser & Grade Tools
items.description: For accurate elevations and consistent grading.

process.heading: Our Site Preparation Process
process.subheading: Organized, efficient, and built around your project schedule.

steps.title: Site Walk & Planning
steps.description: We review drawings, grades, and drainage needs.

steps.title: Topsoil Removal
steps.description: Stripping and stockpiling or hauling of topsoil as required.

steps.title: Rough Grading
steps.description: We shape the land to match proposed elevations.

steps.title: Pad & Access Prep
steps.description: We create stable access roads and building pads.

steps.title: Final Grading
steps.description: Final shaping for drainage and site usability.

serviceArea.heading: Service Area
serviceArea.content: Site preparation and grading services available throughout Brant County and surrounding regions.

items.question: Can you prepare sites for new builds?
items.answer: Yes, we regularly prepare sites for new homes, shops, and agricultural buildings.

items.question: Do you handle drainage issues?
items.answer: Yes, grading and ditching for drainage is a core part of site prep.

items.question: Can you work from engineered site plans?
items.answer: Yes, we work directly from survey and engineering drawings.
